title: Love for Sale
description: Declan's secret is out, but how will Matt react to the news his long-lost friend is alive and well?Will their friendship be torn apart, or will the love they once shared be strong enough to heal their wounds?A long time confidante isnâ€™t to be trusted and is plotting in order to stop Declan from discovering a truth better left buried.Following the events of Thou Shalt Not Love, Matt re-ignites his relationship with Jake, but is the past too strong a pull for him to ever move forward?
author: Zane Michaelson
